overview: For Kiki, who works the night shift of a young bus driver, none of this is a secret. Every shift, he turns the steering wheel and every shift becomes a witness to the dark side of life. And the only opportunity for a guy to escape from grim reality is the world of his erotic dreams filled with searing passions. In them, he can reincarnate in anyone, from a policeman or a fashionable doctor to a millionaire playboy. In them and only in them he is desired and the most languid and most tempting beauties go crazy about him.
title: The Driver
